title: Test Login Successful
manualSteps: 1. Open a clean browser instance and navigate to https://www.saucedemo.com/
2. Verify that the page title is 'Swag Labs' and the login form is visible
3. Locate the Username input field (placeholder='Username') and confirm it is empty and enabled
4. Enter the exact text standard_user into the Username field
5. Locate the Password input field (placeholder='Password') and confirm it is empty and enabled
6. Enter the exact text secret_sauce into the Password field
7. Verify that both fields contain the entered values without extra spaces
8. Locate the Login button and confirm it is enabled
9. Click the Login button
10. Wait for the URL to change to https://www.saucedemo.com/inventory.html
11. Verify that the new page loads successfully (HTTP 200) and contains the text 'Products' in the header
12. Confirm that the browserâ€™s address bar shows the exact inventory.html URL
13. Log the test result as PASS if all assertions are true; otherwise FAIL with detailed notes

title: Test User Locked
manualSteps: Navigate to https://www.saucedemo.com/
Wait until the login form is fully rendered
Locate the Username input field by its placeholder text 'Username'
Enter the exact text locked_out_user into the Username field
Locate the Password input field by its placeholder text 'Password'
Enter the exact text secret_sauce into the Password field
Locate the Login button
Click the Login button
Wait for the error container to appear
Assert that the error container is visible
Assert that the error text is exactly Epic sadface: Sorry, this user has been locked out.
Take a screenshot of the error for evidence (optional but recommended)
Mark the test as passed if all assertions are true
